benchmark_config.jira_title: Implement/Test API: POST /1.0/kb/accounts/{accountId}/block - Block an account

covered: Valid Payload: The suite covers creating a BlockingState with valid payloads across multiple scenarios (TC01–TC05), including minimal data and optional headers/parameters.
Invalid Payload: Tests for malformed JSON (TC10), missing body (TC09), invalid accountId (TC07), malicious payload (TC14), and SQL injection in accountId (TC13).
Duplicate Submission: Regression test TC23 ensures no duplicate BlockingState entries are created.
Large Payloads: Large payload near maximum size tested in TC20.
Validation and Edge Case Coverage: Tests for maximum field lengths (TC16), minimum values (TC17), empty pluginProperty (TC15), and extra query parameter ignored (TC18).
Server Error Handling: DB unavailable (TC12) and plugin service unavailable (TC22).
Integration/Plugin Interactions: Plugin property triggers plugin interaction (TC21) and plugin service behavior covered in (TC22).
Backward Compatibility and Regression: Backward compatibility (TC24) and regression against duplicates (TC23).
Performance: High concurrency (TC25) and sustained performance/resource checks (TC26).
Security: Tests addressing input security (SQL injection TC13 and Malicious payload TC14).
gaps: Rate Limiting: No tests covering rate limiting/throttling for this endpoint.
Caching Behavior: No checks for caching headers on POST responses (ETag/Cache-Control).
Data-type Validation Gaps: No tests for invalid data types within BlockingState fields beyond malformed JSON.
Authorization Granularity: Only 401 Unauthorized tested; no 403 Forbidden scenario tested.
Observability/Logging: No tests verifying logs/metrics for this endpoint.
Unknown Fields Handling: No tests for behavior when extra/unrecognized fields are present in the BlockingState payload.
recommendations: Add rate limiting/throttling tests to verify behavior under burst traffic.
Add caching header checks for POST responses if applicable (ETag/Cache-Control).
Expand payload validation tests to include explicit invalid data types within BlockingState fields.
Add 403 Forbidden scenario to cover authorization boundaries.
Introduce observability/metrics/logging checks for this endpoint for better operability visibility.
Add tests for handling unknown/unrecognized fields in the BlockingState payload.
